handist.collections.dist

Class CollectiveMoveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.CollectiveMoveManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveManager

    public final class CollectiveMoveManager
extends Object
implements MoveManager
    This class is used for relocating elements of distributed collections in a collective manner. I.e. the transfer of instances between places occurs when an instance of this relocator's sync() method is called on every host involved in the transfer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollectiveMoveManager(TeamedPlaceGroup placeGroup)
      Construct a MoveManagerLocal with the given arguments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Removes all the serializers and deserializers contained in this instance
      void request(apgas.Place pl, Serializer serializer, DeSerializer deserializer)
      Submits a pair of serializer and deserializer to the move manager along with the place to which the entries handled by this pair of serializer/deserializer should be transferred to
      void sync()
      Execute the all requests synchronously.

      • CollectiveMoveManager

        public CollectiveMoveManager(TeamedPlaceGroup placeGroup)
        Construct a MoveManagerLocal with the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        placeGroup - the group hosts that will transfer objects between themselves using this instance.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the serializers and deserializers contained in this instance

      • request

        public void request(apgas.Place pl,
                    Serializer serializer,
                    DeSerializer deserializer)
        Description copied from interface: MoveManager
        Submits a pair of serializer and deserializer to the move manager along with the place to which the entries handled by this pair of serializer/deserializer should be transferred to
        Specified by:
        request in interface MoveManager
        Parameters:
        pl - place to which objects should be transferred
        serializer - serializer which will transform some objects into a byte array
        deserializer - complement to the serializer which will transform a byte array back into the original objects

      • sync

        public void sync()
          throws Exception
        Execute the all requests synchronously. When the transfer of objects completes, clears this object so that it can be safely re-used for another transfer.
        Throws:
        Exception - if a runtime exception is thrown at any stage during the relocation
